alert.note: Alert for Union (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 31 at 3:33PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Bradford, north central Alachua and central Union Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 332 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Worthington Spring, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Starke, Lake Butler, Raiford, Worthington Spring, Worthington Springs, Beasley, New River, Sampson, Lawtey and La Crosse. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
